categories: Category:Imperial Navy personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Juren served as the Chief Engineer of the Victory-class Star Destroyer Subjugator, under the command Captain Kolaff, during the Galactic Civil War. Juren was ordered by Kolaff to set the starship's self-destruct after the vessel had come under heavy fire from the Alliance to Restore the Republic's Task Force Starfall.
